Thank you for installing StockScany.

 Here you can find candlestick patterns and price patterns that are mostly widely and effectively used to find the right stock to make profits.

 The candlestick patterns are selected on a downward or upward trend that could signal a possible reversal. We also have the most widely used stock selection patterns that use the price, CCI or RSI to filter out stocks beforehand.

 There is a watchlist to save your selected stocks. Stocks within the watchlist will show you the patterns it satisfied since you added them. 

 We would love to hear any suggestions you have, maybe a new pattern or trading strategy you would want us to show in the app. 

 The scans data following the close of trading is updated in the app after the Nifty data is availaible, which is generally around 6pm. 

 Please note, we show you the most suitable stocks as per the candlestick/breakout patterns, a decision to invest on them should be taken based on the prevailing market conditions.
